maintenance_dataset.description: Synthetic maintenance history for testing Enterprise Context Retention agents. Includes technician logs designed to conflict with established manual specifications.

incidents.technician_notes: Operator reported shuddering during the lift cycle. We tightened the base bolts. Suspect overload, but line manager insists the 560kg fixture on the J2 base is fine.
incidents.agent_verification_context: VIOLATION: Manual [cite: 46] states Max load capacity at J2 base is 550kg. The agent should flag this overload.

incidents.technician_notes: Robot halted during the morning shift. The humidity sensor in the cell read 97% due to a steam leak nearby. Dried the unit and restarted.
incidents.agent_verification_context: VIOLATION: Installation environment [cite: 46] requires Max 95% RH (short term) and no dew.

incidents.technician_notes: Re-calibrated J5. Note: The spot welding gun mounted is heavy. Adjusted motion range to prevent rear interference.
incidents.agent_verification_context: CONTEXT: Verify J5 motion range is within limits (e.g., -120 to +120 degrees) [cite: 46] and check against rear interference area diagrams[cite: 40].

incidents.technician_notes: Found hairline fracture on J3 casing. The team mounted a secondary controller weighing 35kg directly onto the J3 arm for easier access.
incidents.agent_verification_context: VIOLATION: Manual [cite: 462] states Max load capacity at J3 arm is 25kg. The agent must detect this unauthorized modification.

incidents.technician_notes: Robot struggling to hold position during riveting. Payload is exactly 700kg, but the center of gravity seems off. Adjusted servo gains.
incidents.agent_verification_context: RULE CHECK: Confirm payload is within 700kg[cite: 449]. Agent should check if Center of Gravity (CoG) data aligns with allowable load moment/inertia specs[cite: 457, 471].

incidents.technician_notes: Washdown crew sprayed the wrist directly. Unit is IP67 equivalent, so it should be fine, but seals look worn.
incidents.agent_verification_context: CONTEXT: Manual confirms wrist durability is equivalent to IP67 (dust/drip-proof)[cite: 375]. Agent should validate if 'high pressure washdown' exceeds 'drip-proof' context.

incidents.technician_notes: Software error looking for J6 feedback. We don't have a J6, but the new intern tried to force a 6-axis path program onto it.
incidents.agent_verification_context: CONTEXT: The R-1000iA/80H is explicitly a 5-axis type robot[cite: 796]. The agent should flag the program compatibility issue.

incidents.technician_notes: Running at 100% duty cycle. Speed set to 190 deg/s on J1 to meet throughput targets. Motor thermal trip.
incidents.agent_verification_context: VIOLATION: Max speed for J1 axis on the 80H machinery is 185 deg/s[cite: 796]. The agent must catch this parameter violation.

incidents.technician_notes: Robot arm clipped the safety fence during full extension. We thought we had 3.5m clearance, but the reach seems longer than the old B-series.
incidents.agent_verification_context: CONTEXT: Verify Reach. The R-2000iC/125L has a reach of 3100mm[cite: 976]. Agent should confirm if the cell design accounted for the full operating space[cite: 962].

incidents.technician_notes: J4 lagging during heavy wrist rotation. Wrist payload is 120kg. Replaced servo amp.
incidents.agent_verification_context: RULE CHECK: Max load capacity at wrist is 125kg[cite: 976]. Operation is within limits, suggesting genuine hardware failure rather than usage violation.
